molecular.geometry.distance¶

molecular.geometry.distance(a, b=None)[source]¶

Compute the Euclidean distance between two vectors.

Parameters

  • a (ArrayLike) – Vector

  • b (ArrayLike) – (Optional) Vector. If None, b is set to 0 and the distance to the origin is computed.

Returns

Distance

Return type

float
